definitions.definition: Disposed to solicit ; eager to obtain something desirable, or to avoid anything evil .
Showing care, concern, or attention, in any of several ways; thus:

subdefinitions.definition: In a conscientious way, often with kindness.
examples: solicitous inquiries, asking after her husband and children

subdefinitions.definition: In an anxious or distressed way.

definitions.label_groups: Usually followed by about , for , etc., or a clause

main_definition: Disposed to solicit ; eager to obtain something desirable, or to avoid anything evil .
